title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the finish button in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: When pressing the finish button in the JAR packager, an error message is displayed.
EB: The JAR creation process should succeed without displaying any error message.
SR: 1. Open a file in the project. 2. Make changes to the file without saving. 3. Open the JAR packager for the project. 4. Enter all the required information in the JAR packager. 5. Press the finish button.
